evidence.claim: Magnificare utilizes AWS for hosting and cloud services.
The company implements HIPAA compliance and supports various X12 transaction sets.
Integration patterns include API connectivity for EHR systems, supporting HL7 and FHIR standards.
Their cloud infrastructure demonstrates a reliance on Azure services for data interoperability.
Magnificare's platforms leverage healthcare-specific data formats, including X12 and FHIR protocols.

icp.icp_reason: Uses HIPAA and X12 standards for healthcare data exchange.
